features.description: Project setup and initialization - Git repo, folder structure, init.sh script
Create project_context.md documenting project goals, target audience, and design philosophy
Create ideas.md for brainstorming and tracking creative concepts for landing pages
Create reflections-and-best.md for analyzing, reflecting on, and selecting the best 10 landing pages
Research and document Apple.com design patterns - whitespace, typography, animations, colors
Design system creation - CSS variables, typography scale, color palette, spacing system
Reusable component library - buttons, cards, hero sections, CTAs, navigation
Animation utilities - scroll-triggered animations, fade-ins, slide-ins, Apple-style smooth transitions
Valentine's Day infographic landing page with love letter hook
Writers & Creators landing page - showcasing VO3, Nano Banana use cases
Sliding highlight panel interface for dynamic use case demonstrations
Trust & Citations landing page - emphasizing non-hallucination, source verification
Google Workspace Integration landing page - seamless Gmail, Docs, Calendar, Drive integration
Operators & Automators landing page - workspace automation, productivity workflows
Apple.com-inspired minimalist landing page - hero imagery, whitespace, elegant typography
Bundling concept landing page - inspired by Apple's product bundling approach
Research Assistant landing page - deep research with citations, academic use cases
Multimodal AI landing page - image analysis, document processing, visual understanding
Personal Assistant landing page - daily tasks, scheduling, email management
Developer Tools landing page - code generation, debugging, technical documentation
Business Intelligence landing page - data analysis, insights, reporting for professionals
Education & Learning landing page - tutoring, explanations, study assistance
Creative Studio landing page - content creation, brainstorming, ideation tools
Security & Privacy landing page - Google's trust, data protection, enterprise-grade security
Generate 100+ initial landing page concepts in ideas.md across all target segments
Reflection phase 1 - Analyze all concepts, rate effectiveness, identify top 30 candidates
Reflection phase 2 - Deep analysis of top 30, whittle down to top 15 with detailed rationale
Reflection phase 3 - Final selection of best 10 landing pages with complete justification
Implement final 10 landing pages with pixel-perfect design and animations
Create shared CSS file with design system for all landing pages
Create shared JavaScript utilities for animations and interactions
Responsive design testing - ensure all pages work on mobile, tablet, desktop
Install and configure Playwright for automated browser testing
Create Playwright test scripts to capture screenshots of all landing pages
Generate screenshots at multiple viewport sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Visual regression testing - verify design quality and consistency across pages
Performance optimization - minimize file sizes, optimize images, lazy loading
Accessibility audit - ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility
SEO optimization - meta tags, Open Graph, structured data for each landing page
Cross-browser testing - Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge compatibility
Create video/animation elements inspired by Apple.com (if feasible with CSS/JS)
Hero video backgrounds or animated SVGs for premium feel
Micro-interactions and hover effects for enhanced user engagement
CTA optimization - A/B test different call-to-action copy and button styles
Hero text optimization - test different headlines for maximum impact
Create index page that links to all 10 final landing pages for easy navigation
Documentation - README.md with project overview, setup instructions, deployment guide
Create design_guidelines.md documenting the design system and usage patterns
Analytics tracking setup - prepare for Google Analytics or similar (client-side only)
Final review and polish - verify all pages meet quality standards before deployment
